original_text:
The burning sand will become a pool,
    the thirsty ground bubbling springs.
In the haunts where jackals once lay,
    grass and reeds and papyrus will grow.
korean_text: 뜨거운 사막이 변하여 못이 될 것이며 메마른 땅이 변하여 원천이 될 것이며 승냥이의 눕던 곳에 풀과 갈대와 부들이 날 것이며

sentences.original_text: The burning sand will become a pool

sentences.korean_translation: 목마른 땅에서 솟아나는 샘이 될 것이라

sentences.original_text: In the haunts where jackals once lay
grass and reeds and papyrus will grow
